subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Adam Parr, the new chairman of the Williams team, who recently announced that the team had made a profit for last year, says it's not how much you spend, it's where you spend it.
snippet: Adam Parr, the new chairman of the Williams team, who recently announced that the team had made a profit for last year, says it's not how much you spend, it's where you spend it.
